item.title: Neat Call of Duty Zombies Video Pays Tribute to The Mode's History
item.description:
Highlights

  • A Call of Duty Zombies fan creates a unique tribute video to the beloved mode.
  • Zombies mode first appeared in Treyarch's 2008 World at War game.
  • Currently, Treyarch is focusing on a new and exciting project, with some speculating it could be something new instead of Call of Duty.

A Call of Duty Zombies fan created an emotional video that paid tribute to the beloved mode. The feature will reportedly be part of the next Call of Duty entry that is expected to release in late 2024.

Treyarch's Call of Duty: World at War from 2008 was the first game in the popular shooter franchise to include Zombies, providing players with a new round-based survival mode that rewarded teamwork and careful planning. Since then, iterations of the Call of Duty Zombies mode have appeared in other titles in the series, including its latest entry, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 . A fan of the Zombies mode has produced a touching video that looks back on the featureâ€™s long and colorful history.

Related
Call of Duty: 16 Hardest Zombies Maps

The Call of Duty franchise has plenty of challenging zombie maps that will test the survival skills of players across a variety of locations.

TikTok user dig_dug7, a Call of Duty Zombies content creator, recently shared a short video that paid homage to the beloved mode. The POV-style edit uses the television in the distinct main menu of Call of Duty: Black Ops , one of the highest rated Call of Duty games , to show an almost-Marvel-intro-style montage that features maps, characters, and images from the Zombies mode. In the video's caption, dig_dug7 said they were happy to experience Treyarch's Zombies experiences in their prime.

Aside from Call of Duty: World at War , Treyarch also developed the Zombies modes for all five games part of the Call of Duty: Black Ops series. The studio was involved in the development of the open world version of the popular mode in the franchise's latest entry, as well, but Treyarch has since stopped working on Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3's Zombies . Sledgehammer Games has since taken over the development of the newest game's remaining Zombies content.

The Future of Call of Duty Zombies

Treyarch reportedly revealed during a creator call that it shifted its focus to something exciting that was over the horizon. The studio could have diverted its attention to the next Call of Duty title, which Microsoft Gaming CEO and Xbox brand head Phil Spencer said would be released sometime in October 2024. Rumors suggested that 2024's Call of Duty will have a round-based Zombies mode , be the sixth entry in the Call of Duty: Black Ops series, and have a campaign set in the Gulf War.

Call of Duty 2024 could address a criticism of recent Zombies experiences , namely the lack of consistency in terms of seasonal content. Many Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 players have voiced their frustration over the lack of Call of Duty Zombies content in the game following its launch last November. This sentiment could change, however, as Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 â€™s Season 4 update, which drops on May 29, will introduce a host of new content for the titleâ€™s Zombies mode.

item.title: One of Sega's Biggest Franchises Is on Sale Now
item.description:
Highlights

  • Dive into the vast Yakuza series with huge discounts on GOG, offering hours of quality content for a fraction of the price.
  • RGG Studios has maintained high quality across nine mainline Yakuza games, now available at insanely low prices for fans.
  • Act fast to grab Yakuza titles like Yakuza 0 and Yakuza 6 at 70% off retail prices on GOG before the sale ends on May 24.

Sega fans looking to add more games to their digital libraries are in for a treat, as one of the publisher's biggest franchises, the Yakuza series, is currently undergoing a massive sale. With these discounts, gamers can experience hundreds of hours of quality content throughout RGG Studio's expansive saga for less than the price of a single AAA game. Those interested in these Yakuza deals have to act fast, however, as they are only available for a short period of time.

The Yakuza franchise, which was recently renamed Like a Dragon to correlate with its original Japanese branding, has maintained its relevance in the gaming community for nearly two decades. The action-adventure series made its humble debut with the release of the M-rated PS2 game of the same name in 2005. Since then, RGG Studios has released a total of nine mainline installments in the franchise, along with a bucketload of spin-offs and remakes. Despite the fact that there are tons of games in the series, the developers have kept a consistently high bar of quality throughout. Now, fans can try some of these Yakuza titles out for themselves at insanely low prices.

Related
Games To Play If You Love Yakuza

If you love the world of the Yakuza franchise, you'll love these other games - from GTA to Judgement.

Several games in the Yakuza franchise have recently been heavily discounted on CD Projekt Red's PC storefront, GOG. All the mainline titles in the series, save for 2024's Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth , are currently available on sale. Fans can grab DRM-free copies of games like Yakuza 0 , Yakuza Kiwami , and Yakuza 6: The Song of Life for only $5.99, which is 70% off their standard retail prices. Meanwhile, the first turn-based installment in the Yakuza franchise , 2020's Yakuza: Like a Dragon , is now $11.99. Gamers interested in these deals will have to take advantage of them as soon as possible because this Yakuza franchise sale will end on May 24, 2024 .

Players who want to nab Yakuza 0 through 6 can also purchase the "Yakuza Complete Series" bundle for the surprisingly low cost of $33.59. The name of the package is a bit misleading, though, as it obviously doesn't include the two latest mainline entries in the franchise, nor does it contain any of the spin-offs, like the Judgment duology or the forgotten PS3 game Yakuza: Dead Souls . â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹

Players on other platforms who can't make use of these discounts may be pleased to know that all of these RGG Studio titles are also available on Xbox Game Pass. While playing these lengthy games through a subscription service isn't nearly as cheap as buying them outright on GOG, it is important to note that 2023's Like a Dragon: Ishin! and Gaiden titles are also available on Game Pass. Meanwhile, players who prefer to use Valve's storefront might have the chance to take advantage of similar deals in the near future, as the most recent Like a Dragon games were discounted on Steam last month. Nonetheless, many Sega fans will likely not want to miss out on GOG's Yakuza sales.

item.title: Elden Ring Fan's Mother Accidentally Buys Herself a Ranni Painting Without Knowing the Game Exists
item.description:
Highlights

  • Fans of Elden Ring were surprised when a parent unknowingly bought a poster of the game's popular character, Ranni the Witch.
  • The upcoming major expansion for Elden Ring, dropping soon, promises new enemies, difficulty modes, and more content for players.
  • Elden Ring's world, created with George R. R. Martin, features memorable characters like Ranni and offers a rewarding gameplay experience.

An Elden Ring fan discovered that their mother bought a poster of Ranni the Witch despite the parent not knowing anything about the game. A major expansion for the critically acclaimed title is set to drop very soon.

Crafted with the help of acclaimed author George R. R. Martin, the world of Elden Ring features a varied and memorable cast of characters. Among the most popular NPCs of FromSoftware's 2022 RPG is Ranni, a mysterious figure deeply intertwined with the game's narrative. One fan of the title found out that their mom, who knew nothing about Elden Ring , unknowingly acquired an art piece featuring the game's beloved lunar princess.

Related
Elden Ring Fan Discovers Malenia Statue in Unexpected Real-Life Location

An avid Elden Ring fan finds an impressive statue of the iconic boss, Malenia, Blade of Miquella, in the most unexpected of places.

In a post on the Elden Ring subreddit, user comfyawkward revealed that their mother bought a poster of Ranni the Witch online even though the latter had zero knowledge of the game. The poster featured a painting of Ranni by Christian Angel, an artist who has also drawn one of Elden Ring 's hardest bosses , Malenia the Blade of Miquella. Comfyawkward told community members that their mom now knows what Elden Ring is and has become a fan of Malenia and another boss, Rykard. The Reddit user added that the painting of Ranni is now set to be framed and hung in their mother's living room.

Elden Ring Ranni the Witch Poster

As Ranni is one of Elden Ring 's most popular characters, it is no surprise that there is a large amount of fan art featuring her online. One artist, gravitydusty, imagined a past version of Ranni the Witch that provided fans with a glimpse of what the royal might have looked like before her original body was destroyed. This iteration of Ranni had clothes that were similar to the clothes worn by Queen Rennala, Ranni's mother and the final boss of the Raya Lucaria Academy dungeon.

Ranni's Elden Ring questline is one of the game's longest, but it leads to what many consider to be the best ending in the title. This path also rewards players with the Dark Moon Greatsword, one of Elden Ring's very few legendary weapons.

The upcoming major expansion for Elden Ring , which is slated to be released on June 21, is expected to provide fans with a host of new content. This Shadow of the Erdtree DLC will introduce new enemies and difficulty modes, among other things. However, FromSoftware president Hidetaka Miyazaki has confirmed that this will be the sole expansion for Elden Ring .

item.title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 Fan Points Out Interesting Detail About M16 Weapon Kit
item.description:
Highlights

  • Fans are divided on the new fully automatic M16 in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3, with some praising the gameplay enhancement and others questioning balance.
  • The recent update for MW3 brings significant improvements, including new weapon prestige camos and fixes to gameplay issues like incompatible attachments.
  • While the full-auto M16 has excited players, there are concerns about gameplay balance and the risk of overpowered weapons disrupting Ranked matches.

A Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 player has pointed out an important detail about the M16 assault rifle in multiplayer, sparking a mix of excitement and debate among fans. In a recent update, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 added the new M16 function to its multiplayer mode. This marks a significant change to the weapon's traditional three-round burst fire mechanism. Fans are expressing mixed reactions, with some celebrating the new addition while others debate its impact on gameplay balance.

The latest update for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone introduces significant enhancements aimed at improving the gameplay experience. This update expands weapon prestige camos and addresses various balancing issues. Key improvements include the ability to unlock weapon prestige camos for Modern Warfare 2 weapons, fixing the JAK Wardens conversion kit to prevent the use of incompatible attachments, and correcting the COR-45's firing rate.

Related
Call of Duty: Warzone Reveals an Iconic Sniper is Returning in Season 4

It's making its way back to Call of Duty: Warzone in Season 4, but players are anxious over which version of this iconic sniper rifle they'll get.

The full-auto M16 was highlighted on Reddit by user Edgethedarkness, who noted it took 17 years for the game to feature this mode for the iconic weapon. The update has been met with enthusiasm from some players, who appreciate the new firing mode's potential to enhance gameplay dynamics. Meanwhile, others argue that the M16's full-auto mode undermines the weapon's original design purpose, calling for adjustments to ensure it doesn't overshadow other rifles.

Fans' Mixed Reactions to MW3's Fully Automatic M16

The JAK Patriot Aftermarket Part for the M16 has been introduced recently, transforming the M16 into a fully automatic assault rifle. This attachment enhances gun kick, recoil control, and damage range, making it a versatile option for players. The M16's transformation into a fully automatic weapon is a notable shift in the Call of Duty franchise, which has a long history of tweaking weapon mechanics. Historically, burst-fire weapons like the M16 have struggled with balancing issues. Players often find these guns either too powerful or too weak, depending on the burst delay and damage output.

The previous weekly update for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 brought a host of improvements and fixes across various game modes as well. Key changes focus on resolving progression bugs, glitches in the Zombies mode, and multiple multiplayer issues. Bug fixes include addressing premature obelisk activation and correcting display issues for Wonder Weapons. Multiplayer adjustments feature fixes to the Escort game mode and the popular Skidrow map, improvements to Hardcore Quick Play, and resolving visual discrepancies in weapon HUDs.

Balancing gameplay and weapons has always been challenging, as seen in other games like Battlefield and previous Call of Duty titles. The recent Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 update has disrupted Ranked matches , too. Intended to address various bugs and enhance gameplay, the update has instead introduced significant issues, including enabling hackers to exploit the game by using overpowered weapons like rockets in Ranked mode. The Call of Duty community remains divided, but this update underscores the developers' commitment to innovation and responsiveness to player feedback.

item.title: Uniqlo Reveals New Summer 2024 Pokemon Line
item.description:
Highlights

  • Uniqlo's new Pokemon shirt line, featuring Pikachu, Eevee, and more, is set to launch in July, targeting fans of all ages.
  • Other brands like Fendi and Puma have also collaborated with Pokemon to release luxury and athleisure merchandise for superfans.
  • The Pokemon franchise shows no signs of slowing down, with rumors of Gen 10 swirling as fans eagerly anticipate the next game release.

Uniqlo has announced a new line of Pokemon shirts to be released later this summer. The Japanese fashion brand is well known for its history of collaborating with various video game franchises, and it's not the first time that it's had a partnership with Pokemon .

Pokemon , established back in 1996 with the release of Pokemon Red and Green , is such a worldwide phenomenon and cultural force that well-known brands regularly partner with the franchise to release their own merch targeted toward its millions of fans. The Pokemon merch that's been created over the decades include apparel, accessories, shoes, and so much more.

Related
Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Players Can Claim a New Limited-Time Distribution

Pokemon Scarlet and Violet launch a new limited-time distribution event, featuring a Pokemon inspired by the Pokemon Horizons anime.

Uniqlo recently revealed the Summer 2024 Pokemon line of shirts for both kids and adults on its official Japanese website, with an arrival date of July later this year. Dubbed the "UT" collaboration, the shirts feature a number of popular Pokemon, including perennial favorite Pikachu, as well as fellow Generation 1 representatives Eevee, Snorlax, Gengar, Ditto, and Dragonite. Piplup and Sylveon from Gen 4 and 6, respectively, round out the line, ensuring a rather wide selection for all kinds of fans. It's yet unknown whether this UT line will reach Uniqlo stores in other countries, but these collabs have often done so in the past.

Pokemon Featured on the Uniqlo Summer 2024 Line

  • Pikachu
  • Eevee
  • Sylveon
  • Piplup
  • Ditto
  • Snorlax
  • Gengar
  • Dragonite

While Uniqlo is a regular collaborator with the game franchise, it's not the only brand that's put out a collection so far this year. Luxury brand Fendi partnered with streetwear company FRGMT back in January to release a line of clothing and accessories featuring the Dragonite family . However, these particular pieces cost thousands of dollars, as expected from a luxury name â€” the new Uniqlo shirts are definitely going to be more accessible to the regular Pokemon fan.

Another hyped collaboration was the partnership between Pokemon and sportswear brand Puma from 2022. The well-received line included athleisure apparel and the brand's classic sneakers themed after Pokemon like Pikachu, Charmander, Bulbasaur, and Squirtle. With so much Pokemon merch out there, superfans will have a lot of pieces to collect and express their fandom with.

Meanwhile, the Pokemon franchise won't be slowing down and dying out any time soon, which means there will be more merch to make moving forward. The mainline game series is already on pace to release its next entries, with so many Pokemon Gen 10 rumors already swirling around online . Pokemon Scarlet and Violet , the last new mainline entries, revitalized the series, getting fans excited to see where Game Freak and The Pokemon Company take the games next.
